        getPrimaryHorizontal in class TextViewEx

        postionAtLine - - character index (in getText()). poasitionAtLine >= getLineStart(line) && positionAtLine < getLineEnd(line)
        viewWidth - - current view width (required for calculating offset correctly, with justification and alignment)

        - x-coordinate of left bound of character
